result.execSummary:
The defendant Dale A Bergen was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Straight Time.
Apply 20 days sentence credit, if revoked.

miscConds.notes: Cash bail applied - PAID IN FULL.  Balance of cash bail to be refunded to poster.
Maintain employment and/or combination of schooling.
AODA assessment and follow through with any treatment recommended.

ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.
Submit to random urine screens.
No use or possession of alcohol, illegal drugs or drug paraphernalia.
No use or possession of prescription drugs without a valid prescription.
Any valid prescription drugs must be taken only in the manner in which they are prescribed.
Inform Agent of any and all prescriptions.
Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent.
No association with known drug users or dealers and no contact at any place where illegal drugs are purchased, used, stored, packaged and distributed.
No presence on any premises whose primary business is serving or selling alcohol (for example, bars, taverns or liquor stores).
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
No violent contact with the victim listed in the Criminal Complaint.
Cases 15CM1921, 15CM2486 and 15CM2422 are dismissed and read in.

timeConds.notes:
Non-working hours (Huber) with all Standard Release Conditions.
STAYED.
To be used at the Agent's discretion.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Dale A Bergen

defendant.name: Bergen, Dale A
defendant.address: N89w15878 Main St #5, Menomonee Falls, WI 53051

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Notice of Case Status Change - Revoked - Sentenced to Jail/HOC
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Timothy Suha appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant Dale A Bergen in court with attorney Jorge R Fragoso.

Defendant enters a plea of Guilty to the charge.
Court finds the defendant Guilty of the charge.



Court orders the following:
5 Months in the Waukesha County Jail - Straight-Time.
20 Days Credit.
STAYED.

Term of Probation:  1 Year.
CONDITIONS OF PROBATION:  
AODA Assessment and follow through with any treatment recommended;
Absolute Sobriety;  Random U.A.'s ; 
No Use or Possession of alcohol, controlled substances or drug paraphernalia.
No Use or Possession of prescription drugs without a valid prescription;
Any valid prescription drugs must be taken only in the manner in which they are prescribed.
Inform Agent of all prescriptions
Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent;
Maintain employment and/or combination of schooling 
No violent contact with:  victim listed in the complaint.
DNA sample to be provided.
No association with known drug users or dealers and no contact at any place where illegal drugs are purchased, used, stored, packaged, or distributed.
No presence on any premises whose primary business is serving or selling alcohol (i.e bars, taverns, or liquor stores).

Costs:  $243
DNA Sample and Surcharge: $200
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
Apply Bail.
Refund Balance to the posting party.


CONDITION TIME:
20  Days in the Waukesha County Jail w/huber (all standard release conditions).
STAYED - To be used at the agents discretion.
Authorization to Appear, received and filed in court.

District Attorney's Office Law Intern, Katrina Seipel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Attorney Jorge R Fragoso in court.   
Defendant Dale A Bergen did not appear.    
Attorney appeared by Authorization.
Defense still in negotiations with the state.
File not called on the record.
  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 6, 2016 at 09:30 am.
Absolute sobriety, defendant is not to possess or consume any alcohol.  Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.

Defendant Dale A Bergen in court, in custody, with attorney Eryn Menden for attorney Jorge R Fragoso.    District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT.
  Hearing scheduled for November 16, 2015 at 02:00 pm.
Waukesha County Pretrial Screening Services Report by Wisconsin Community Services filed.
